outline:
1. to oppress, suppress, treat violently, maltreat, vex, do wrong
    1. (Qal) to oppress, suppress
    2. (Hiphil) to treat violently, maltreat
kjv_def: destroy, (thrust out by) oppress(-ing, -ion, -or), proud, vex, do violence.
strongs_def: to rage or be violent; by implication, to suppress, to maltreat
